controller.event

Interface EventManageControl

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EventManageController

    public interface EventManageControl
    The Controls for the EventManageScreen
    See Also:
    EventManageScreen

    • Method Detail

      • getActions

        ActionsPresenter getActions()
        Get the possible actions, specified by the type of user of the logged in.

      • getManagingEvents

        EventsPresenter getManagingEvents()
        Get all events that the loggedIn is managing (i.e. the organizer or speaker equals to the loggedIn)

      • getSpeakers

        PeoplePresenter getSpeakers()
        Get all speakers (i.e. everyone that can speak).

      • getEventStatus

        EventStatusPresenter getEventStatus(Event event)
        Get the status of the Event.

      • createTalk

        Respond createTalk(java.lang.String title,
                   java.lang.String location,
                   java.lang.String date,
                   java.lang.String time)
        Create the Talk through EventManager. Try to add the Talk. Create the Announcement Group for that event. Set the organizer to the loggedIn.

      • assignSpeaker

        Respond assignSpeaker(Event event,
                      java.util.UUID speaker)
        Create a Speaker Duty through TaskManage. Try to add the speaker duty to the new speaker. If there is an old speaker, - remove speaker duty. - delete announcement access. - remove work relation to Attendees. Add the new speaker's access to announcement. Update Work Relation: - New Speaker to Attendees +1 Set the speaker through EventManage.

      • messageAllAttendee

        Respond messageAllAttendee(Event event,
                           java.lang.String message)
        Message all attendees of the event.
